name: magnetic-flux
effect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
short_effect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
